items.name: Anti-Parasitic Paste
items.description: Anti-Parasitic Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration of theParasitesdebuff upon consumption.

items.name: Anti-Poison Paste
items.description: Anti-Poison Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the tier 1 tech tree. Reduces the duration ofPoisonfrom critters like theVenomous Fishor theCaveworm.

items.name: Antibiotic Paste
items.description: Antibiotic Paste reduces the duration of bacterial infections like food poisoning and theCave Sicknessdebuff from caves by 50% upon consumption.

items.name: Antibiotic Pill
items.description: Antibiotic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such asCave Sickness,Infected Wounds, andFood Poisoning.

items.name: Antibiotic Tonic
items.description: Used alone to cure infections such asCave Sickness,Infected Wound, andFood poisoning, or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylacticAntibiotic Pill.

items.name: Basic Bandage
items.description: Basic Bandage is used to heal Wound and Exotic WoundStatus Effects.

items.name: Blood Thinning Paste
items.description: Blood Thinning Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration ofConcussionsandContusionswhen you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree.

items.name: Carbon Paste
items.description: Carbon Paste is a crafted resource meant to be smelted in aConcrete FurnaceorElectric Furnaceto makeCarbon Fiberand is a critical component inTier 4crafting.

items.name: Composite Paste
items.description: Composite Paste is an end-game crafted resource which can be smelted intoCompositesinside of theElectric Furnace.

items.name: Cooling Bandage
items.description: The Cooling Bandage is used to heal Heatstroke, Heat Exhaustion and Exotic OverheatStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still extremely high, the cooling bandage will not remove these debuffs.

items.name: Cured Leather
items.description: Cured Leather is a crafted resource used in variousTier 3ArmorsandTools. Below is a list of armors that use Cured Leather:
items.crafted_at: Crafted atDrying RackSmokerAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atDrying RackSmokerAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Cured Leather Lure
items.description: The Cured Leather Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Cured Leather Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Health Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic preparation that temporarily increases health.In-game flavor text:Like so many things on Icarus, the exact ingredients would probably render this concoction illegal on Earth.

items.name: Health Regeneration Paste
items.description: In-game description:A herbal confection that speeds healing.In-game flavor text:The lily's high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.

items.name: Health Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic fusion that restores health.In-game flavor text:The combination of Icarus's unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of 'useful' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.

items.name: Heat Bandage
items.description: Heat Bandage is used to heal Frostbite, Frosty and Exotic ChillStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still freezing, the heat bandage will not remove these debuffs.

items.name: Oxygen Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural concoction that increases available oxygen.In-game flavor text:Your parents are a long way from here. What you do with your body is your business.

items.name: Oxygen Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural beta blocker.In-game flavor text:This preparation reduces the heart rate, dropping oxygen consumption temporarily.

items.name: Oxygen Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic co-factor that rapidly restores oxygen.In-game flavor text:Helper molecule

items.name: Poison Paste
items.description: Poison Paste is used for making a variety of items, such as medicines likeAnti-Poison Pillor ammo likePoison Arrow.

items.name: Shengong "Yeying" Bandage
items.description: The Shengong "Yeying" Bandage is an overly pricedBasic Bandagepurchased from the Workshop that will remove theBleedingmodifier when consumed.

items.name: Stamina Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:A herbal concoction, temporarily increasing stamina.In-game flavor text:While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the 'wakers' once offered to long haul space pilots.

items.name: Stamina Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A biotic compound that slows stamina loss temporarily.In-game flavor text:The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.

items.name: Stamina Regeneration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic stimulant that accelerates stamina recovery.In-game flavor text:A herbal preparation that acts rapidly on the sympathetic nervous system, increasing noradrenergic activity.

items.name: Stamina Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural stimulant that restores lost stamina.In-game flavor text:As countless athletes, party-goers and would-be mystics have noted, the line between natural stimulant and highly addictive narcotic is arbitrary, at best.

items.name: Water Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural preparation, temporarily reducing the body's need for water.In-game flavor text:The key word here is 'temporarily'.
